ingredients.item: 500g pack essential Waitrose British Pork Mince
250g pouch Jamie Oliver Sensational Sweet Chilli Spelt

instructions.step: Place the shallot and pepper in a small food processor and finely chop. Mix into the mince with the cumin and season. Divide into 8 and roll into sausage shapes about 12cm long. Place on a rack over a foil lined tray under a preheated grill for 12-15 minutes, turn until cooked through.
Meanwhile, cook the sweetcorn and soya beans in boiling water for 3-4 minutes, add the spinach to the water and cook until wilted, then drain.
